unnormalised: Okay, return policies, huh? Found a beautiful saree for Diwali, but the colour was off!
normalised: Okay, return policies, huh? Found a beautiful saree for D-I-W-A-L-I, but the color was off!

unnormalised: Happened to my friend, Priya. Check the fine print!
normalised: Happened to my friend, P-R-I-Y-A. Check the fine print!

unnormalised: Many stores are good, like Fabindia, but some local shops near Chandni Chowk can be tricky.
normalised: Many stores are good, like F-A-B-I-N-D-I-A, but some local shops near C-H-A-N-D-N-I C-H-O-W-K can be tricky.

unnormalised: Return policies should be clear, like a good biryani recipe.
normalised: Return policies should be clear, like a good biryani recipe.

unnormalised: No one wants a "no returns" surprise after already paying Rs. 2000.
normalised: No one wants a "no returns" surprise after already paying rupee two thousand.

unnormalised: Make sure to read those terms and conditions properly.
normalised: Make sure to read those terms and conditions properly.
